body_html:
After several tests, the torch.Tensor([1]) constructor dispatches to the unpackdouble, but torch.Tensor(4).fill_(1) dispatches to the unpacklong. Could someone explain it for me?

That's pretty weird. Since you made that comment, we've merged Variable and Tensor, so maybe this is more uniform now. Can you try it again? @gchanan do you know off the top of your head what the behavior here should be?
body_text:
After several tests, the torch.Tensor([1]) constructor dispatches to the unpackdouble, but torch.Tensor(4).fill_(1) dispatches to the unpacklong. Could someone explain it for me?

That's pretty weird. Since you made that comment, we've merged Variable and Tensor, so maybe this is more uniform now. Can you try it again? @gchanan do you know off the top of your head what the behavior here should be?
body:
> After several tests, the torch.Tensor([1]) constructor dispatches to the unpackdouble, but torch.Tensor(4).fill_(1) dispatches to the unpacklong. Could someone explain it for me?

That's pretty weird. Since you made that comment, we've merged Variable and Tensor, so maybe this is more uniform now. Can you try it again? @gchanan do you know off the top of your head what the behavior here should be?
